title: Eve's E should do 1 less damage to Sion during his W

replies.body: 1 Damage less... You want her to heal sion?

> [{quoted}](name=Saianna,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThTc15hn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-09T22:56:46.600+0000)
>
> 1 Damage less... You want her to heal sion?

Sion with spectre's cowl can already technically be healed so it doesn't matter
Noob question, but how does that work?

> [{quoted}](name=KoeniSTIGg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThTc15hn,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-04-10T19:05:50.537+0000)
>
> Noob question, but how does that work?

If you deal less than 150% of his base health regeneration to him, he will be healed by the Spectre's Cowl for more than you dealt.

And with his shield up, that damage will proc the regen, but not pop the shield

so free heals

> [{quoted}](name=DeusVult,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThTc15hn,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-10T23:07:44.593+0000)
>
> And with his shield up, that damage will proc the regen, but not pop the shield
> 
> so free heals

Spectre's Cowl doesn't proc through shields.
As an Eve main, I upvote this. I feel bad when I abuse my E against a shielded Sion, and I think -1 damage will prevent Eve from getting 100% pick/ban ratio.
it will seperate the good eves from the great eves
Do people remember any hidden interactions at all since Riot removed the ninja buff? Two people think this is an actual nerf lol

> [{quoted}](name=Kaellrus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ThTc15hn,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-04-10T01:01:13.069+0000)
>
> Do people remember any hidden interactions at all since Riot removed the ninja buff? Two people think this is an actual nerf lol

Well, the only interactions i can think of left after those ninja ones are "This unit is a mighty Pirate!" "This unit is a mighty Pirate! Hunter!" Zilean vs Volibear stuff, Rengar vs Kha'Zix stuff(Only kha'zix really benefits from it now) and umm, uhh, tryna remember the last one. I can't though.
sej ash and liss. for the crown. and if you have sunglasses leonas ult does 1 less damage.
What about if zyra kills sion, or vice versa they gain a bonus gold. Did they remove that?
Actually Rengo gets an extra buff that he can't otherwise get from BTN when It becomes head of Kha'Zix. This buff gives Rengo increased vision range when he's in a brush. Just fyi :)
It's still the short end of that stick

Vi/Cait vs Jinx

Vi and Cait on the same team.
I still find it funny all the champions with sunglasses take one less damage from Leona. Wish they would return the ninja interaction.
1+ just for the summoner name
I think they still get 1 less hp?
If they make it magic damage again,  sure. >.>
Keep the on-hit though. I like my shiv/echo instant nuke. Managed to do 50% tank hp with it once xD.
Wow apparently people hate AP eve. o.o *unfolds umbrella from massive downvotes*
I love her. But I love watching things explode too. =( Sorry. But that damage cannot be denied.
I loved her as an AP bruiser personally. She's really fun, if weak.
Oh the memories....
yes
My friend Kaellrus said that you can't 1v1 Amumu because he's OP.
More Eve nerf :L
